title: Scheduled NA Maintenance - October 19, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance for NA Worlds on Thursday, October 19, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 11:00 PM AEDT).

title: Maple Memo: GMS Roadmap Q4 2023
content: We share our Global MapleStory Roadmap that includes the updates and changes coming in v.245 - v.247 2023.

title: [Updated 10/12] v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus.

title: Cash Shop Update for October 11
content: Premium Surprise Style Box and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - October 12, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: [Updated Oct. 12th] Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. V
content: It's time to Journey Toward the Sixth Star! Play through the different chapters of the Journey Toward the Sixth Star event and earn some unique rewards.
